channel.title: Wont Connect To My No-ip $5 Paypal! IF FIXED
channel.description: Hi i tried to set up my server and my friends cant connect and i need help with port fowarding setting my server up! 5-10$ Paypal If Fixed!

item.title: Wont Connect To My No-ip $5 Paypal! IF FIXED
item.dc:creator: @I_like_rods4 I like rods4
item.description:
@I_like_rods4 wrote:

This happens when i start up my client

connecting to Dark Regrets
no midi or mp3 files in folder
connected to Dark Regrets
javax.sound.midi.MidiUnavailableException: A device ID has been used that is out
of range for your system.
at com.sun.media.sound.MidiOutDevice.nOpen(Native Method)
at com.sun.media.sound.MidiOutDevice.implOpen(Unknown Source)
at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMidiDevice.doOpen(Unknown Source)
at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMidiDevice.openInternal(Unknown Source)
at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMidiDevice.getReceiverReferenceCounting(U
nknown Source)

loading custom spirts part 1
loading custom spirts part 2

item.title: Wont Connect To My No-ip $5 Paypal! IF FIXED
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:3, topic:370299”][quote author=str2own99 link=topic=466415.msg3411010#msg3411010 date=1290692829]
learn to pf u knob
[/quote]

Grow up.

@topic: I suggest you re-read the automatic portforwarding tutorial.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

(PS don’t offer money)[/quote]

As Tom said you should look into using that tool, but also a easy way to check to see if you portforwarded correctly, you just go to any site that offers to check to see if a port is open. If it says it is offline you may have done a few things wrong, but are easy to fix.

  1. You didn’t port forward correctly, make sure that your IP is the same in the router or else the port won’t forward to your computer but another on your network.

  2. You OS firewall is blocking it, this is an easy fix, all you do is add an exception to your firewall as said in the “How To Start A Server” topic, make sure the port matches the port your trying to open or else the port will stay closed.

  3. Is not a problem with what you did, but is a solution, you can use the port forward tool released by Ry as quote by Tom, and add that to your server, the tool will do all the work for you and port forward the server to the port you want to use.

Read full topic
